figure_1.title: Fig. 1. Distribution of myopic fundus changes, eye globe staphyloma, and macular schisis of all study patients.
figure_1.caption: For myopic fundus classification, Category 0 = “no myopic retinal degenerative lesion”, Category 1 = “tessellated fundus”, Category 2 = “diffuse chorioretinal atrophy”, Category 3 = “patchy chorioretinal atrophy”, and Category 4 = “macular atrophy”. For staphyloma and macular schisis, Y = YES, N = NO.

figure_2.title: Fig. 2. The predicted cytokines values were scatter-plotted against eye globe axial lengths; the scatter plots and regression lines were identified by the symbols for each specific cytokine.
figure_2.caption: Pred predicted, Ln natural log.

claims.sentence: Myopic characteristic changes of international fundus grading, staphyloma, and macular schisis was plotted in Fig. 1 against axial length.

Open in a new tab
^spherical equivalent, *high blood pressure.Fig. 1.
The predicted values of cytokines from multivariate linear regressions were plotted in Fig. 2 against global axial lengths.

For the association strength with globe axial length, sICAM-1 was the greatest and TGF- β2 the weakest, MCP-1 was in between (sICAM-1 > MCP-1 (p < 0.0001) > TGF- β2 (p = 0.0001)) (Fig. 2).Discussion
Myopia epidemic is rapid expanding and may result in increasing prevalence of pathologic myopia.
Myopic characteristic changes of international fundus grading, staphyloma, and macular schisis was plotted in Fig. 1 against axial length.
